column1: I want to go to Lucknow from delhi. Please suggest me which travel medium safe to travel in this current scenario of Covid-19 pandemic.

Hey Sanchit I Suggest you to take IntrCity Smartbus to travel Lucknow which is I think more safe instead of train travel. IntrCity Smartbus by railyatri implement all safety measure as per govt. guidelines & ensure Covidsafe+ travel for their commuters. IntrCity provide Covid Insurance, private cabins for individuals & for families etc. Book Now!
